body:
Syntax: cast 'word of recall'
        recall

Word of recall instantly transports you to your hometown temple, providing
a quick escape from dangerous situations. This is one of the most important
survival spells in the game.

Classes: Cleric
Level: 12
Mana Cost: 20
Position: Standing, Sitting, or Fighting

The spell cannot be cast if you are in a NO_RECALL room or if you are in
combat with a mob that prevents recall. There is also a "recall" command
that works the same way.

See Also: TELEPORT, GROUP RECALL
